name: elimnv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c2, wcel(c0, c1)), c1)
-| wcel(c2, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c2, wcel(c0, c1)), c1)
-| wcel(c2, c1)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c2, c1)
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(c3, cnv), wcel(c2, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c2 ∈ c1
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ (c3 ∈ NrmCVec → c2 ∈ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c2, wcel(c0, c1)), c1)
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
-| wi(wcel(c3, cnv), wcel(c2, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ if(c0 ∈ c1, c0, c2)∈ c1
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ (c3 ∈ NrmCVec → c2 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c3, cnv), wcel(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cn0v, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c3 ∈ NrmCVec → c2 ∈ c1)
⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(0vec ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cif(c0, c2, wcel(c0, c1)), c1)
-| wcel(c3, cnv)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cn0v, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ if(c0 ∈ c1, c0, c2)∈ c1
⊣ c3 ∈ NrmCVec
⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(0vec ` c3)

comment: Hypothesis elimination lemma for normed complex vector spaces to assist weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
